scripts.deploy: yarn run kill-dev; yarn run clean-next-cache; yarn run prepare; gcloud app deploy $MANIFEST
scripts.deploy:stage: gcloud config set project celo-reserve-site-281118; NODE_ENV=production DEPLOY_ENV=development MANIFEST=stage.yaml yarn run deploy && yarn view -s stage
scripts.deploy:prod: gcloud config set project celo-reserve-site-281118; NODE_ENV=production DEPLOY_ENV=production MANIFEST=production.yaml yarn run deploy && yarn view
